name: Hlína
summary: Immerse yourself in the depressing and atmospheric city of Hlína, where, as a young boy named Oliver, you face the harsh realities of life. Work in a factory, care for your mother, play mini-games, and uncover a deep story in this hand-crafted city.

name: Hljod
summary: Hljod is an adventure rhythm game set in a mysterious world inspired by Northern and Eastern European legends. Explore dreamlike locations, learn new melodies, and defeat monsters in musical duels. Restore color to the world and achieve creative ascension.

name: HLFX: Lost in Black Mesa
summary:
A singleplayer mod for Half-Life based on a new version of Half-Life FX Graphics Add-on. It consists of three gameplay levels.

You will visit a laboratory complex and a part of Black Mesa monorail transit system. Similar to the HLFX: Single demo version, you will face doors with keypads and have an opportunity to manually delve into electric wiring, restoring the power for some systems.

Do not forget that Black Mesa complex is way too large, so there are some secret places in the game that are not accessed easily. Upon revealing a secret the game will show how many places like that are on the level, and they are on each level. So keep your eyes open!

name: Hlina
summary:
A dream in a world of plasticine.

hlina is an adventure game released as a part of the 39th edition of the indie virtual zine Indiepocalypse. It will be released as a standalone game in May 2023.
